eligibilityTitle: Check if you can apply online
title: Has an Inheritance Tax (IHT) form been filled in
hintText: This could be an Inheritance Tax estate report or a paper Inheritance Tax form.
hintTextIHTSubmitted: If you submitted an IHT400 form, HMRC will send you a letter with the unique probate code you need to complete this probate application. The letter can take up to 20 working days to arrive.
question: Has an Inheritance Tax (IHT) form been filled in?

completed.required: Select ‘yes’ if an Inheritance Tax form has been completed
